# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is a book with algorithms.

Look for @alg-novo.

See @alg-red for red and @alg-blue for blue.

``` {.pseudocode label=#alg-novo}
\begin{algorithmic}
    \State $i \gets 10$
    \If{$i\geq 5$} 
        \State $i \gets i-1$
    \Else
        \If{$i\leq 3$}
            \State $i \gets i+2$
        \EndIf
    \EndIf 
\end{algorithmic}
```
